game_description: Feel the joy and excitement of real bowling! •Real world dynamic ball hook motions and pin actions make you feel the same satisfaction of hitting a perfect strike as playing bowling in real life! •In total of 9 challenging oil patterns to bowl on! Bowl like a pro, adapt your game and conquer on any lane conditions! •Online Free Play mode let's you bowl with your friends and others all around the world the way you want it. You can hold a casual bowling party or you can join together for a thrilling stepladder competition! •Engage in Daily Events to clinch the titles and challenge yourself for the best scores! •Challenging Versus AI mode to test your bowling skills to the limit! •Score 300 points or more easily in an action-packed 100-pin game! But scoring a perfect 3000 points game won't be as easy!
review_1: Pretty much everything is simulated like irl just without the weight of the ball and for the price it is this makes it one of the best bowling vr games I've played
review_2: How help me to join a public server
review_3: It helps me practice because I’m in a league
review_4: For the life of me I can’t find an option to invite ppl to my private room or even invite a friend to my lane on a public game. It advertises multiplayer but impossible to do with friends. I don’t want to bowl with ppl i don’t know. Once this is resolved I’ll update my review. This is my only gripe so far.
review_5: This game is amazing it’s cheap and a good game and it couldn’t get any better there are no glitches and multiplayer work
